BOCA CHICA BEACH  At dusk on the evening before a recent Starship launch, dozens of people wandered the tidal flats around Starbase, staring up at the skyscraper-sized rocket looming over them.

articles.title: New Copilot for Microsoft 365 features will be rolled out in July - Neowin
articles.description: Microsoft has revealed a number of upcoming  Copilot for Microsoft 365 integrations with other software products that are due to launch in July, such as adding AI-created art in Word and PowerPoint.
articles.content: Microsoft has more plans to integrate its Copilot for Microsoft 365 generative AI assistant service in many of its current software products in the near future. In the company's latest overview for C… [+1692 chars]

articles.title: Exclusive: Gemini's data-analyzing abilities aren't as good as Google claims - TechCrunch
articles.description: New research shows that Google might be overstating its generative AI's ability to reason over long documents.
articles.content: One of the selling points of Google’s flagship generative AI models, Gemini 1.5 Pro and 1.5 Flash, is the amount of data they can supposedly process and analyze. In press briefings and demos, Google … [+8344 chars]
